title.narrative: 3.1 PROGRAMMING CAPACITIES AT CENTRAL AND DECENTRALISED LEVELS

description.narrative: 3.1 Institutional actors have the capacities at the central and decentralized level for generation and use of disaggregated data and evidence participatory programming based on equity and which takes into account the risks intersectoral and partner coordination and management transparent and efficient resources, which contributes to Access To Quality Learning Opportunities, Health And Development In Early Childhood And Adolescence, Promotion Of Care, Mental Health And Psychosocial Well-Being And Justice, Protection From Violence, Exploitation, Abuse And Neglect, Protection From Violence, Exploitation, Abuse And Neglect (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Data, Research, Evaluation And Knowledge Management, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: In 2025, education, health and protection systems are resilient, ensure equitable and quality access and promote the effective, inclusive, participation of children and their families

related-activity.ref: 4320/A0/05/883 3. EFFECTIVE EDUCATION, HEALTH AND PROTECTION SYSTEMS

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: 3.1 Institutional actors have the capacities at the central and decentralized level for generation and use of disaggregated dataand evidence; participatory programming based on equity and which takes into account the risks; intersectoral and partnercoordination; and management transparent and efficient resources

description.narrative: The 26 education regional plans developed to strengthen the equity and quality of education through an iterative action training process at decentralised level have been validated in 2021, with the involvement of civil society and available to support bottom-up design of the new SDG4 focused sector strategic plan. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:29/11/2021
